review: We ordered this Fire TV Stick but found that it would not stay connected to our wireless network.  Sometimes it wouldn't even find our network.  It was plugged into the HDMI at the back of our set.  We ended up ordering an extender after all other attempts to connect failed (read through all of the troubleshooting ideas on Amazon but none worked).  We ended up ordering an extension HDMI cable from CABLE-MIX ($7.99) and it solved the connectivity issues perfectly!  We are now enjoying watching Amazon Prime shows & movies.
